'''Jared Lawrence Hess''' (born July 18, 1979) is an American filmmaker, known for creating many films, including {{AMCM}}, in which he also voiced {{AMCM|General Chungus}}, and its [[Untitled A Minecraft Movie sequel|sequel]].<ref name="AMCM2">{{Citation|url=https://deadline.com/2025/10/minecraft-2-release-date-1236574896|title='Minecraft 2' Is Happening With Director Jared Hess Returning; Summer 2027 Release Set|website=Deadline Hollywood|date=October 9, 2025}}</ref>
